metadata.title: CVE-2019-0227 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A Server Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability affected the Apache Axis1.4 distribution that was last released in 2006. Security and bug commitscommits continue in the projects Axis 1.x Subversion repository, legacyusers are encouraged to build from source. The successor to Axis 1.x isAxis2, the latest version is 1.7.9 and is not vulnerable to this issue.

criterions.comment: axis: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
